title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu on a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the TH 
2. Right-click on a field 
3. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu
